BusinessType.name: BusinessType
BusinessType.description: Represents a category of any activity (business or individual), such as healthcare, restaurant, or retail. This object is available in API version 49.0 and later.

ActivityCode.description: A code identifying the principal business activity of a business or individual.

AuthorizationActivityType.description: The type of entity performing the activity.

Industry.description: The industry to which the business is related.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the business type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user that owns this record.
